segments.text: My friend Emily recently lost 18 pounds .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The point is that she has been persuading me to lose weight too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , it's a good thing for you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good ? Yes , it's good for her but not for me . You see , she tells me that I'll feel better about myself if I slim down . She keeps giving me newspaper clippings about the latest miracle diet and insists that I join a health club , as she has .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So you don't think you are fat and need to lose weight ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I just can't bear it that Emily made me feel like a baby who always pigs out on junk food .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: junk food is not good for your health . Too much of it will make you fat .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But junk food is so easy . It requires no silverware or plates , no rigid mealtimes , no pleases and thank yous .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , but junk food has many disadvantages . As junk food contains high amount of oil and fat , you'll feel sleepy , but not be able to concentrate when you have a lot of it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , but life without chips , ice cream and coca cola is boring .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me see . You could exercise more to keep fit .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , that sounds better than giving it up .
segments.speaker: S1
